basic_info.description: I'm a software engineer based in the DFW area. I have always been drawn to technology and innovation, and after graduating from the University of North Texas in the spring of 2022, I took the leap and transitioned from the healthcare industry to start my tech journey that summer. As a detail-oriented person, I have a passion for designing, developing, and maintaining websites and mobile applications and ensure that every aspect I bring is top-notch and user-friendly. In my free time, I love to hang out with friends/family, try new foods, travel, journal, and play video games! I also love everything Studio Ghibli :)

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: Built a functional web application using Python and Django that allows for CRUD operations on data stored in a SQL database. The application features user-centered components such as login, logout, and signup, all implemented using HTML templates, views, models, and apps. The design of the application was also enhanced using HTML5 and CSS to provide an improved user experience.

projects.title: CarCar
projects.description: Used PostgreSQL, Django, React, and JSX to develop a web application for managing car services, sales, and inventory. The application includes the implementation and deployment of a microservice that allows users to create and view services. The microservices were integrated with RESTful APIs, which were then utilized in the development of a React-based front-end for the application.

projects.title: PlateMate
projects.description: Developed a Yelp-like application using a combination of PostgreSQL, Django, React, JSX, and Tailwind. The application includes a questionnaire feature for users, as well as integration with the YelpAPI for filtering options. Data retrieval and creation are handled using FastAPI and MySQL, with authorization and authentication implemented to secure the application.
